You can find them here on Amazon, or for even cheaper on eBay.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Some exfoliating tips, and tips for using the cloth:&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;- When exfoliating, be sure to soak in a tub of hot water for at least 1/2 hr (until your fingers and toes are pruned) before exfoliating, or your skin might not slough off as much as you&#x27;d like.
